import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Navbar from 'react-bootstrap/Navbar'; import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import firebase from '../infocomponents/firebase'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function UserNavComponent() { const [ userName, setUser ] = useState('LOGIN'); const [ loginStatus, setStatus ] = useState(''); function signOutUser() { firebase .auth() .signOut() .then(function() { console.log('Sign-out successful'); }) .catch(function(error) { console.log('An error happened'); }); } firebase.auth().onAuthStateChanged(function(resultUser) { if (resultUser) { console.log('USER LOGGED IN'); setStatus('SignOut'); let user = resultUser.email; if (user != null) setUser(`${user.substr(0, user.indexOf('@'))}`); else setUser(`Hi, ${resultUser.phoneNumber}`); } else { // No user is signed in. console.log('USER NOT LOGGED IN'); setUser('LOGIN'); setStatus(''); } }); return (
F I T O M
HOME SERVICE BOOKING {userName === 'LOGIN' ? ( {`Hi, ${userName}`} ) : ( {`Hi, ${userName}`} //To be made. )} FAQ {loginStatus}

Hello ! {userName}

SERVICE PACKAGES WE PROVIDE

STANDARD

  • Gear Tune up
  • Hubs Checkup
  • Alignment of Headset
  • Bottom Bracket Checkup
  • Check and adjust brakes
  • Check and Lube Chain
  • Check and Lube Cables
  • Wipe clean the bicycle
  • Check tyres & inflate to correct pressure
  • Checking and Tightening all screws and bolts

PREMIUM

  • Gear Tune up
  • Hubs Checkup
  • Alignment of Headset
  • Bottom Bracket Checkup
  • Check and adjust brakes
  • Check and Lube Chain
  • Check and Lube Cables
  • Wipe clean the bicycle
  • Wheel Truing ( Not wheel bend )
  • Check tyres & inflate to correct pressure
  • Checking and Tightening all screws and bolts
  • Dismantle of Hubs, Center Bracket and Headset

ADVANCED

  • Bike Spa
  • De-grease/Re-grease and re-install Hubs/BB/Headset
  • Lubricate gear cable (inner/outer)
  • Check wheel true/tension/dish on wheel stand
  • Lubricate drive
  • Gear and brake adjustment
  • Check torque on all bolts to manufacturer’s specifications
  • Safety check and report
  • Race tune
  • Check tyres for correct inflation and adjust accordingly
); } export default UserNavComponent;
